ticket.title: Improve HTML generated by Scaffold
ticket.original-body:
Just small improvements, following best practices for HTML writing:
b -> strong p -> div for non-paragraphs
And added a meta for defining charset to utf-8, as it is the most common approach for internationalized applications.

version.title: Improve HTML generated by Scaffold

version.body:
We discussed scaffold changes on the mailing list some time ago. That included a long discussion whether to use <b> or <strong>. After that, we decided to not use scaffold, because if we change to <strong>, someone will come, say it's wrong and want to change back to <b> again.
And we are not required to give content type neither charset as meta tag since Rails sends those headers properly.
